summary: This is a Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) New York Daily Activity Report for August 11, 2019, documenting routine prison operations, inmate movements, and staffing. It is significant as it was created the day after Jeffrey Epstein's death in the same facility, though his name is not mentioned in this excerpt.

persons.name: Mora
persons.context: Inmate (ID 087036-054) reported by the Morning Watch Shift Lieutenant as moved to special housing pending investigation.

persons.name: Ramos
persons.context: Inmate (ID 85428-054) reported as on Psychological Observation with an inmate companion.

persons.name: Willey
persons.context: Inmate (ID 76330-054) reported as a new admission to MCC New York.

events.title: MCC New York Daily Operations
events.description: Routine prison operations including inmate movements to special housing and psychological observation, new admissions, and staff leave usage.

locations: Metropolitan Correctional Center, New York, NY 10007
keyFacts: This is a routine prison operations report from the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) New York dated August 12, 2019, covering activities from August 11, 2019.
The report documents inmate Mora being moved to special housing pending investigation.
The report documents inmates Ramos and an unnamed inmate on psychological observation with inmate companions.
The report is part of the Epstein case document set but does not mention Jeffrey Epstein or any key figures from his case directly in this excerpt.
The document's date (August 12, 2019) is one day after Jeffrey Epstein's death in the same facility on August 10, 2019.
